about.title: About me
about.content:
Electrical Engineering graduate who retrained as a ReactJS/NodeJS full stack Web Development currently using the MERN stack.

Polyglot, subtitler and part-time translator.
My leisure time is spent learning new languages or Web development technologies for the most part, or fishing when in Sweden.

Open to job opportunities within the Paris and Östersund regions.

skills.title: Skills
skills.content:
As an Electrical Engineer, coding has been an ubiquitous part of my curriculum, I have been introduced to quite early on through embedded systems, integrated circuits and microcontrollers overall.

I also speak five languages – here I am speaking a Slavic one –, and therefore use my linguistic skills for series translation.

Soon, this list may likely broaden — I am a keen learner after all!

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.content:
Several projects among which I have been working on. Do check out my Github page to find out about the remaining ones.

All of my projects are responsive, most of which in mobile-first.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.content: I will automatically acknowledge receipt of your e-mail in your own language.
contact.name: Name
contact.emptyFields: All fields must be filled out.
